articles.title: "He Played Only Three Balls": Rohit Sharma's Honest Take On Suryakumar Yadav After Loss - NDTV Sports
articles.description: India vs Australia: India skipper Rohit Sharma admitted that Suryakumar Yadav is going through a bad phase, but backed the underfire batter.
articles.content: India player Suryakumar Yadav is definitely not having the best of times. The batting star scored three consecutive golden ducks in India's just-concluded ODI series against Australia. While he is th… [+1371 chars]
